min_stacks.description: The minimum number of stacks. Negative numbers are allowed.

duration_per_stack.description: Determines the duration of the specified status effect(s) for each stack.

tick_rate.description: Determines how fast the power will gain/lose stacks in ticks.

effect.description: If specified, this status effect will be applied on the entity that has the power.

effects.description: If specified, these status effects will be applied on the entity that has the power.
